${ModID}:ValorForm.NAME: Valor
DESCRIPTION: While in this #yDrive #yForm, every attack played draws 1 card. NL Costs 4 #yDrive #yPoints to enter. NL Costs 2 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.

${ModID}:WisdomForm.NAME: Wisdom
DESCRIPTION: While in this #yDrive #yForm, whenever you play a card gain 2 #yBlock. NL Costs 4 #yDrive #yPoints to enter. NL Costs 2 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.
